content.rendered:
Competitor Tracking
Application, Documentation, and Blog Post


Tracking Competitors

Tracking Competitors is an app I created on the Salesforce platform to enable the sales teams with easy access to competitive intelligence from opportunity records, with company information and selling tips that are competitor specific, as well as quantify the current market status for you vs your competitors by giving you reporting on the number of deals you compete against each competitor and win/loss against them to help you strategize.

Resources



Blog Post

Learn about the application, what it does and how it works.

Read More



End User Documentation

Documentation for End Users on the Tracking Competitors App

View Docs



The App

Install the app from the GitHub repo.  You’ll find the Deploy to Salesforce button here for easy install!

View Repo
